title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The software should successfully synchronize a .java file and another resource without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 

1. Open the software and navigate to the synchronization feature.
2. Select a .java file and choose another resource to synchronize with.
3. Initiate the synchronization process.
4. Observe that the synchronization fails and an error or unexpected behavior occurs.
